items.title: ONGC eyes 100-fold growth in new energy investment at Rs 1 lakh crore
items.description: India's largest explorer wants to invest Rs 1 lakh crore ($11.5 billion) to build a renewables portfolio of 10 gigawatts by 2030, up from Rs 1,000 crore in the current fiscal year.

items.title: IOC, BPCL to sign multibillion-dollar LNG purchase deals with Adnoc
items.description: The deals highlight India’s plan to more than double the share of gas in its energy mix by the end of this decade, even as infrastructure bottlenecks are constraining the expansion.

items.title: Why investors should consider this stock, a proxy for health insurance growth
items.description: TPAs are a relatively stable play on the overall growth of the health insurance industry

items.title: Should you participate in the re-listing of Hexaware Technologies?
items.description: The issue comes at an interesting time when technology is facing AI-led disruptions while prospects remain bright

items.title: Escorts Kubota Q3 stands on a shaky pitch
items.description: Demand remains soft and EBITDA margins likely to be subdued in the near term

items.title: Ola Electric Q3 FY25: Still a long journey to profitability
items.description: Gross profit improves but bottom line remains a concern

items.title: Eicher Motors Q3 FY25: Firing on all cylinders; positive outlook
items.description: Strong volume growth aided growth across segments

items.title: Power major NTPC discusses nuclear buildout with foreign firms
items.description: Electricite de France SA, Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power, Rosatom Corp, plus US firms GE Vernova Inc and Holtec International Corp. are among the companies in discussion with NTPC over technology cooperation, said the executive familiar with the conversations, asking not to be named as the plans aren’t yet public.

items.title: Varun Beverages: Growth momentum to sustain with key drivers in place
items.description: Strong earnings visibility, backed by superior execution and large growth headroom.

items.title: What Indian EPC companies need to brace for
items.description: Given that over the last two years, the Budget did little to rev up allocations in infrastructure the EPC sector may continue to face sluggish order flows, unless private capex takes over

items.title: China targets US tech giants like Nvidia and Apple as trade war escalates
items.description: Nvidia, already dealing with US export restrictions on selling high-end chips to China, is facing additional scrutiny in one of its biggest markets.

items.title: Elon Musk-led group proposes buying OpenAI for $97 billion. Sam Altman says 'no thank you'
items.description: The bid intensifies Musk’s ongoing legal dispute with OpenAI and its CEO, Sam Altman, whom he has accused of deviating from the company’s founding principles.

items.title: Mankind Pharma divests stake in Mahananda Spa to Chalet Hotels at Rs 530 crore Enterprise Value
items.description: The Share Purchase Agreement will be executed soon, said Mankind Pharma, and the transaction will be completed by February 28, 2025. Mahananda Spa had a turnover of Rs 74.33 crore in FY24, and a networth of Rs 401.35 crore.

items.title: Eicher Motors names Siddhartha Lal executive chairman, Govindarajan as MD; announces other board changes
items.description: Eicher Motors has announced a few key changes to its board, with Managing Director Siddartha Lal being named Executive Chairman as S Sandilya retires after a five-decade career at the automobiles firm.

items.title: Coal India subsidiaries BCCL, CMPDI's IPOs likely in FY26
items.description: Coal secretary Vikram Dev Dutt has said the government is hopeful of the listings in the new fiscal and the work is on schedule

items.title: Boeing signals more orders needed before setting up assembly line in India
items.description: Indian airlines, including Tata's Air India and IndiGo, have about 1,800 aircraft on order with global planemakers and are scheduled to take delivery of 130 jets this year

items.title: Nokia picks Intel's AI and data center leader Hotard as new CEO
items.description: Hotard, who will take up the position on April 1, is currently the executive vice president and general manager of Data Center & AI Group at Intel, according to the chipmaker's website

items.title: Cummins delivers strong Q3 growth amid competitive pressure
items.description: The company is focusing on long-term cost efficiency, superior technology, and stronger product positioning.

items.title: NCC Limited: Disappointing Q3; expect double-digit growth from FY26
items.description: With the Lok Sabha and Maharashtra elections behind us & a new government in place, we expect project approvals, new order awarding, and the payment cycle to pick up, which would boost execution

items.title: Britannia Industries Q3: The cookie tastes better
items.description: Better volume growth aided by execution.

items.title: Hero MotoCorp Q3 FY25: Decent show with attractive valuation
items.description: The company reported third consecutive quarter with revenue in excess of Rs 10,000 crore

items.title: In its latest IPO, Hexaware’s promoters are reaping the benefits of high market valuations
items.description: The company is selling shares at significantly higher valuation than its exit price in 2020

items.title: Waaree Energies starts commercial production at solar cell manufacturing facility in Gujarat's Chikhli
items.description: This marks the first phase of commissioning at the country’s largest solar cell manufacturing facility, which has a total planned capacity of 5.4 GW, including 4 GW of high-efficiency TOPCon solar cells in the next phase, said the company statement

items.title: Accenture scraps diversity and inclusion goals
items.description: The company will start 'sunsetting' the diversity goals it set in 2017, along with career development programs for 'people of specific demographic groups', said the memo from CEO Julie Sweet.

items.title: Tejas Networks in Rs 525 crore tech collaboration with Japan's NEC for global telecom market
items.description: NEC is a leading global player in the 5G area, and the collaboration will see both companies develop standards and advanced networking solutions 'for 5G and beyond'.
